---
title: "EDA Plots"
output: html_document
date: "2025-11-10"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

breedcount <- data.frame(breeds = c('French Bulldog', 'Schnauzer', 'German Shepherd', 'Miniature Poodle', 'Golden Retriever', 'Beagle', 'Shi-Tzu', 'Siberian Husky'), count = c(159,155,152,155,150,195,214,192))

breedcount <- breedcount %>% arrange(count) %>% mutate(breeds = fct_inorder(breeds))

ggplot(breedcount,aes(y=breeds,x=count)) + geom_histogram(stat='identity', fill='chocolate') + theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x='Number of Images',y='Dog Breed',title='Number of Images for Each Dog Breed')
```
